00043 static void
00044 fillDpxChannelInfo(DpxFile* dpx, DpxChannelInformation* chan, int des) {
00045 
00046     (void)dpx; /* unused */
00047     
00048     chan->signage = 0;
00049     chan->ref_low_data = htonl(0);
00050     chan->ref_low_quantity = htonf(0.0);
00051     chan->ref_high_data = htonl(1023);
00052     chan->ref_high_quantity = htonf(2.046);
00053     chan->designator1 = des;
00054     chan->transfer_characteristics = 0;
00055     chan->colourimetry = 0;
00056     chan->bits_per_pixel = 10;
00057     chan->packing = htons(1);
00058     chan->encoding = 0;
00059     chan->data_offset = 0;
00060     chan->line_padding = htonl(0);
00061     chan->channel_padding = htonl(0);
00062     chan->description[0] = 0;
00063 }
00064 
00065 static void
00066 dumpDpxChannelInfo(DpxChannelInformation* chan) {
00067     d_printf("  Signage %ld", (intptr_t)ntohl(chan->signage));
00068     d_printf("  Ref low data %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(chan->ref_low_data));
00069     d_printf("  Ref low quantity %f\n", ntohf(chan->ref_low_quantity));
00070     d_printf("  Ref high data %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(chan->ref_high_data));
00071     d_printf("  Ref high quantity %f\n", ntohf(chan->ref_high_quantity));
00072     d_printf("  Designator1: %d,", chan->designator1);
00073     d_printf("  Bits per pixel %d\n", chan->bits_per_pixel);
00074     d_printf("  Packing: %d,", ntohs(chan->packing));
00075     d_printf("  Data Offset: %ld,", (intptr_t)ntohl(chan->data_offset));
00076 }
00077 
00078 static void
00079 fillDpxFileInfo(
00080     DpxFile* dpx, DpxFileInformation* fileInfo, const char* filename) {
00081 
00082     time_t fileClock;
00083     struct tm* fileTime;
00084 
00085     /* Note: always write files in network order */
00086     /* By the spec, it shouldn't matter, but ... */
00087 
00088     fileInfo->magic_num = htonl(DPX_FILE_MAGIC);
00089     fileInfo->offset = htonl(dpx->imageOffset);
00090     strcpy(fileInfo->vers, "v1.0");
00091     fileInfo->file_size = htonl(dpx->imageOffset +
00092         pixelsToLongs(dpx->height * dpx->width * dpx->depth) * 4);
00093     fileInfo->ditto_key = 0;
00094     fileInfo->gen_hdr_size = htonl(
00095         sizeof(DpxFileInformation) +
00096         sizeof(DpxImageInformation) +
00097         sizeof(DpxOriginationInformation));
00098     fileInfo->ind_hdr_size = htonl(sizeof(DpxMPIInformation));
00099     fileInfo->user_data_size = 0;
00100     strncpy(fileInfo->file_name, filename, 99);
00101     fileInfo->file_name[99] = 0;
00102 
00103     fileClock = time(0);
00104     fileTime = localtime(&fileClock);
00105     strftime(fileInfo->create_date, 24, "%Y:%m:%d:%H:%M:%S%Z", fileTime);
00106     /* Question: is %Z in strftime guaranteed to return 3 chars? */
00107     fileInfo->create_date[23] = 0;
00108 
00109     strcpy(fileInfo->creator, "David's DPX writer");
00110     fileInfo->project[0] = 0;
00111     fileInfo->copyright[0] = 0;
00112     fileInfo->key = 0xFFFFFFFF; /* same in any byte order */
00113 }
00114 
00115 static void
00116 dumpDpxFileInfo(DpxFileInformation* fileInfo) {
00117     d_printf("\n--File Information--\n");
00118     d_printf("Magic: %8.8lX\n", (unsigned long)ntohl(fileInfo->magic_num));
00119     d_printf("Image Offset %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(fileInfo->offset));
00120     d_printf("Version \"%s\"\n", fileInfo->vers);
00121     d_printf("File size %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(fileInfo->file_size));
00122     d_printf("Ditto key %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(fileInfo->ditto_key));
00123     d_printf("Generic Header size %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(fileInfo->gen_hdr_size));
00124     d_printf("Industry Header size %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(fileInfo->ind_hdr_size));
00125     d_printf("User Data size %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(fileInfo->user_data_size));
00126     d_printf("File name \"%s\"\n", fileInfo->file_name);
00127     d_printf("Creation date \"%s\"\n", fileInfo->create_date);
00128     d_printf("Creator \"%s\"\n", fileInfo->creator);
00129     d_printf("Project \"%s\"\n", fileInfo->project);
00130     d_printf("Copyright \"%s\"\n", fileInfo->copyright);
00131     d_printf("Key %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(fileInfo->key));
00132 }
00133 
00134 static void
00135 fillDpxImageInfo(
00136     DpxFile* dpx, DpxImageInformation* imageInfo) {
00137     imageInfo->orientation = 0;
00138     imageInfo->channels_per_image = htons(1);
00139     imageInfo->pixels_per_line = htonl(dpx->width);
00140     imageInfo->lines_per_image = htonl(dpx->height);
00141 
00142     if (dpx->depth == 1) {
00143         fillDpxChannelInfo(dpx, &imageInfo->channel[0], 0);
00144 
00145     }
00146     else if (dpx->depth == 3) {
00147         fillDpxChannelInfo(dpx, &imageInfo->channel[0], 50);
00148     }
00149 }
00150 
00151 static void
00152 dumpDpxImageInfo(DpxImageInformation* imageInfo) {
00153 
00154     int n;
00155     int i;
00156     d_printf("\n--Image Information--\n");
00157     d_printf("Image orientation %d,", ntohs(imageInfo->orientation));
00158     n = ntohs(imageInfo->channels_per_image);
00159     d_printf("Channels %d\n", n);
00160     d_printf("Pixels per line %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(imageInfo->pixels_per_line));
00161     d_printf("Lines per image %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(imageInfo->lines_per_image));
00162     for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00163         d_printf("  --Channel %d--\n", i);
00164         dumpDpxChannelInfo(&imageInfo->channel[i]);
00165     }
00166 }

00178 static void
00179 dumpDpxOriginationInfo(DpxOriginationInformation* originInfo) {
00180     d_printf("\n--Origination Information--\n");
00181     d_printf("X offset %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(originInfo->x_offset));
00182     d_printf("Y offset %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(originInfo->y_offset));
00183     d_printf("X centre %f\n", ntohf(originInfo->x_centre));
00184     d_printf("Y centre %f\n", ntohf(originInfo->y_centre));
00185     d_printf("Original X %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(originInfo->x_original_size));
00186     d_printf("Original Y %ld\n", (intptr_t)ntohl(originInfo->y_original_size));
00187     d_printf("File name \"%s\"\n", originInfo->file_name);
00188     d_printf("Creation time \"%s\"\n", originInfo->creation_time);
00189     d_printf("Input device \"%s\"\n", originInfo->input_device);
00190     d_printf("Serial number \"%s\"\n", originInfo->input_serial_number);
00191 }

00193 static void
00194 initDpxMainHeader(DpxFile* dpx, DpxMainHeader* header, const char* shortFilename) {
00195     memset(header, 0, sizeof(DpxMainHeader));
00196     fillDpxFileInfo(dpx, &header->fileInfo, shortFilename);
00197     fillDpxImageInfo(dpx, &header->imageInfo);
00198     fillDpxOriginationInfo(dpx, &header->originInfo, &header->fileInfo);
00199 #if 0
00200     fillDpxMPIInfo(dpx, &header->filmHeader);
00201 #endif
00202 }
00203 
00204 static void
00205 dumpDpxMainHeader(DpxMainHeader* header) {
00206     dumpDpxFileInfo(&header->fileInfo);
00207     dumpDpxImageInfo(&header->imageInfo);
00208     dumpDpxOriginationInfo(&header->originInfo);
00209 #if 0
00210     dumpDpxMPIInformation(&header->filmHeader);
00211 #endif
00212 }

00220 static void
00221 verboseMe(DpxFile* dpx) {
00222 
00223     d_printf("size %d x %d x %d\n", dpx->width, dpx->height, dpx->depth);
00224     d_printf("ImageStart %d, lineBufferLength %d, implied length %d\n",
00225         dpx->imageOffset, dpx->lineBufferLength * 4,
00226         dpx->imageOffset + pixelsToLongs(dpx->width * dpx->depth * dpx->height) * 4);
00227 }
00228 
00229 int
00230 dpxGetRowBytes(DpxFile* dpx, unsigned short* row, int y) {
00231 
00232     /* Note: this code is bizarre because DPX files can wrap */
00233     /* packed longwords across line boundaries!!!! */
00234 
00235     size_t readLongs;
00236     unsigned int longIndex;
00237     int numPixels = dpx->width * dpx->depth;
00238     int pixelIndex;
00239 
00240     /* only seek if not reading consecutive lines */
00241     /* this is not quite right yet, need to account for leftovers */
00242     if (y != dpx->fileYPos) {
00243         int lineOffset = pixelsToLongs(y * dpx->width * dpx->depth) * 4;
00244         if (verbose) d_printf("Seek in getRowBytes\n");
00245         if (logimage_fseek(dpx, dpx->imageOffset + lineOffset, SEEK_SET) != 0) {
00246             if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't seek to line %d at %d\n", y, dpx->imageOffset + lineOffset);
00247             return 1;
00248         }
00249         dpx->fileYPos = y;
00250     }
00251 
00252     /* read enough longwords */
00253     readLongs = pixelsToLongs(numPixels - dpx->pixelBufferUsed);
00254     if (logimage_fread(dpx->lineBuffer, 4, readLongs, dpx) != readLongs) {
00255         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't read line %d length %d\n", y, (int)readLongs * 4);
00256         return 1;
00257     }
00258     ++dpx->fileYPos;
00259 
00260     /* convert longwords to pixels */
00261     pixelIndex = dpx->pixelBufferUsed;
00262 
00263     /* this is just strange */
00264     if (dpx->depth == 1) {
00265         for (longIndex = 0; longIndex < readLongs; ++longIndex) {
00266             unsigned int t = ntohl(dpx->lineBuffer[longIndex]);
00267             dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex] = t & 0x3ff;
00268             t = t >> 10;
00269             dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex+1] = t & 0x3ff;
00270             t = t >> 10;
00271             dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex+2] = t & 0x3ff;
00272             pixelIndex += 3;
00273         }
00274     }
00275     else /* if (dpx->depth == 3) */ {
00276         for (longIndex = 0; longIndex < readLongs; ++longIndex) {
00277             unsigned int t = ntohl(dpx->lineBuffer[longIndex]);
00278             t = t >> 2;
00279             dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex+2] = t & 0x3ff;
00280             t = t >> 10;
00281             dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex+1] = t & 0x3ff;
00282             t = t >> 10;
00283             dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex] = t & 0x3ff;
00284             pixelIndex += 3;
00285         }
00286     }
00287     dpx->pixelBufferUsed = pixelIndex;
00288 
00289     /* extract required pixels */
00290     for (pixelIndex = 0; pixelIndex < numPixels; ++pixelIndex) {
00291         if (dpx->params.doLogarithm)
00292             row[pixelIndex] = dpx->lut10_16[dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex]];
00293         else
00294             row[pixelIndex] = dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex] << 6;
00295     }
00296 
00297     /* save remaining pixels */
00298     while (pixelIndex < dpx->pixelBufferUsed) {
00299         dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex - numPixels] = dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex];
00300         ++pixelIndex;
00301     }
00302     dpx->pixelBufferUsed -= numPixels;
00303 
00304     /* done! */
00305     return 0;
00306 }
00307 
00308 int
00309 dpxSetRowBytes(DpxFile* dpx, const unsigned short* row, int y) {
00310 
00311     /* Note: this code is bizarre because DPX files can wrap */
00312     /* packed longwords across line boundaries!!!! */
00313 
00314     size_t writeLongs;
00315     int longIndex;
00316     int numPixels = dpx->width * dpx->depth;
00317     int pixelIndex;
00318     int pixelIndex2;
00319 
00320     /* only seek if not reading consecutive lines */
00321     /* this is not quite right yet */
00322     if (y != dpx->fileYPos) {
00323         int lineOffset = pixelsToLongs(y * dpx->width * dpx->depth) * 4;
00324         if (verbose) d_printf("Seek in getRowBytes\n");
00325         if (logimage_fseek(dpx, dpx->imageOffset + lineOffset, SEEK_SET) != 0) {
00326             if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't seek to line %d at %d\n", y, dpx->imageOffset + lineOffset);
00327             return 1;
00328         }
00329         dpx->fileYPos = y;
00330     }
00331 
00332     /* put new pixels into pixelBuffer */
00333     for (pixelIndex = 0; pixelIndex < numPixels; ++pixelIndex) {
00334         if (dpx->params.doLogarithm)
00335             dpx->pixelBuffer[dpx->pixelBufferUsed + pixelIndex] = dpx->lut16_16[row[pixelIndex]];
00336         else
00337             dpx->pixelBuffer[dpx->pixelBufferUsed + pixelIndex] = row[pixelIndex] >> 6;
00338     }
00339     dpx->pixelBufferUsed += numPixels;
00340 
00341     /* pack into longwords */
00342     writeLongs = dpx->pixelBufferUsed / 3;
00343     /* process whole line at image end */
00344     if (dpx->fileYPos == (dpx->height - 1)) {
00345         writeLongs = pixelsToLongs(dpx->pixelBufferUsed);
00346     }
00347     pixelIndex = 0;
00348     if (dpx->depth == 1) {
00349         for (longIndex = 0; longIndex < writeLongs; ++longIndex) {
00350             unsigned int t = dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex] |
00351                     (dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex+1] << 10) |
00352                     (dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex+2] << 20);
00353             dpx->lineBuffer[longIndex] = htonl(t);
00354             pixelIndex += 3;
00355         }
00356     }
00357     else {
00358         for (longIndex = 0; longIndex < writeLongs; ++longIndex) {
00359             unsigned int t = dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex+2] << 2 |
00360                     (dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex+1] << 12) |
00361                     (dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex] << 22);
00362             dpx->lineBuffer[longIndex] = htonl(t);
00363             pixelIndex += 3;
00364         }
00365     }
00366 
00367     /* write them */
00368     if (fwrite(dpx->lineBuffer, 4, writeLongs, dpx->file) != writeLongs) {
00369         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't write line %d length %d\n", y, (int)writeLongs * 4);
00370         return 1;
00371     }
00372     ++dpx->fileYPos;
00373 
00374     /* save remaining pixels */
00375     pixelIndex2 = 0;
00376     while (pixelIndex < dpx->pixelBufferUsed) {
00377         dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex2] = dpx->pixelBuffer[pixelIndex];
00378         ++pixelIndex;
00379         ++pixelIndex2;
00380     }
00381     dpx->pixelBufferUsed = pixelIndex2;
00382 
00383     return 0;
00384 }
00385 
00386 #define LFMEMFILE   0
00387 #define LFREALFILE  1
00388 
00389 static DpxFile* 
00390 intern_dpxOpen(int mode, const char* bytestuff, int bufsize) {
00391 
00392     DpxMainHeader header;
00393     const char *filename = bytestuff;
00394     DpxFile* dpx = (DpxFile*)malloc(sizeof(DpxFile));
00395     
00396     if (dpx == 0) {
00397         if (verbose) d_printf("Failed to malloc dpx file structure.\n");
00398         return 0;
00399     }
00400 
00401     /* for close routine */
00402     dpx->file = 0;
00403     dpx->lineBuffer = 0;
00404     dpx->pixelBuffer = 0;
00405 
00406     if (mode == LFREALFILE) {
00407         filename = bytestuff;
00408         dpx->file = BLI_fopen(filename, "rb");
00409         if (dpx->file == 0) {   
00410             if (verbose) d_printf("Failed to open file \"%s\".\n", filename);
00411             dpxClose(dpx);
00412             return 0;
00413         }
00414         dpx->membuffer = 0;
00415         dpx->memcursor = 0;
00416         dpx->membuffersize = 0;
00417     }
00418     else if (mode == LFMEMFILE) {
00419         dpx->membuffer = (unsigned char *)bytestuff;
00420         dpx->memcursor = (unsigned char *)bytestuff;
00421         dpx->membuffersize = bufsize;
00422     }
00423     
00424     dpx->reading = 1;
00425 
00426     if (logimage_fread(&header, sizeof(header), 1, dpx) == 0) {
00427         if (verbose) d_printf("Not enough data for header in \"%s\".\n", filename);
00428         dpxClose(dpx);
00429         return 0;
00430     }
00431 
00432     /* let's assume dpx files are always network order */
00433     if (header.fileInfo.magic_num != ntohl(DPX_FILE_MAGIC)) {
00434         if (verbose) d_printf("Bad magic number %8.8lX in \"%s\".\n",
00435             (uintptr_t)ntohl(header.fileInfo.magic_num), filename);
00436         dpxClose(dpx);
00437         return 0;
00438     }
00439 
00440     if (ntohs(header.imageInfo.channel[0].packing) != 1) {
00441         if (verbose) d_printf("Unknown packing %d\n", header.imageInfo.channel[0].packing);
00442         dpxClose(dpx);
00443         return 0;
00444     }
00445 
00446 
00447     dpx->width = ntohl(header.imageInfo.pixels_per_line);
00448     dpx->height = ntohl(header.imageInfo.lines_per_image);
00449     dpx->depth = ntohs(header.imageInfo.channels_per_image);
00450     /* Another DPX vs Cineon wierdness */
00451     if (dpx->depth == 1) {
00452         switch (header.imageInfo.channel[0].designator1) {
00453         case 50: dpx->depth = 3; break;
00454         case 51: dpx->depth = 4; break;
00455         case 52: dpx->depth = 4; break;
00456         default: break;
00457         }
00458     }
00459     /* dpx->bitsPerPixel = 10; */
00460     dpx->bitsPerPixel = header.imageInfo.channel[0].bits_per_pixel;
00461     if (dpx->bitsPerPixel != 10) {
00462         if (verbose) d_printf("Don't support depth: %d\n", dpx->bitsPerPixel);
00463         dpxClose(dpx);
00464         return 0;
00465     }
00466 
00467     dpx->imageOffset = ntohl(header.fileInfo.offset);
00468     dpx->lineBufferLength = pixelsToLongs(dpx->width * dpx->depth);
00469     dpx->lineBuffer = malloc(dpx->lineBufferLength * 4);
00470     if (dpx->lineBuffer == 0) {
00471         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't malloc line buffer of size %d\n", dpx->lineBufferLength * 4);
00472         dpxClose(dpx);
00473         return 0;
00474     }
00475 
00476     /* could have 2 pixels left over */
00477     dpx->pixelBuffer = malloc((dpx->lineBufferLength * 3 + 2) * sizeof(unsigned short));
00478     if (dpx->pixelBuffer == 0) {
00479         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't malloc pixel buffer of size %d\n",
00480                 (dpx->width * dpx->depth + 2 + 2) * (int)sizeof(unsigned short));
00481         dpxClose(dpx);
00482         return 0;
00483     }
00484     dpx->pixelBufferUsed = 0;
00485 
00486     if (logimage_fseek(dpx, dpx->imageOffset, SEEK_SET) != 0) {
00487         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't seek to image data start at %d\n", dpx->imageOffset);
00488         dpxClose(dpx);
00489         return 0;
00490     }
00491     dpx->fileYPos = 0;
00492 
00493     logImageGetByteConversionDefaults(&dpx->params);
00494     /* The SMPTE define this code:
00495      *  0 - User-defined
00496      *  1 - Printing density
00497      *  2 - Linear
00498      *  3 - Logarithmic
00499      *  4 - Unspecified video
00500      *  5 - SMPTE 240M
00501      *  6 - CCIR 709-1
00502      *  7 - CCIR 601-2 system B or G
00503      *  8 - CCIR 601-2 system M
00504      *  9 - NTSC composite video
00505      *  10 - PAL composite video
00506      *  11 - Z linear
00507      *  12 - homogeneous
00508      *
00509      * Note that transfer_characteristics is U8, don't need
00510      * check the byte order.
00511      */
00512     
00513     switch (header.imageInfo.channel[0].transfer_characteristics) {
00514         case 1:
00515         case 2: /* linear */
00516             dpx->params.doLogarithm= 0;
00517             break;
00518         
00519         case 3:
00520             dpx->params.doLogarithm= 1;
00521             break;
00522         
00523         /* TODO - Unsupported, but for now just load them,
00524          * colors may look wrong, but can solve color conversion later
00525          */
00526         case 4: 
00527         case 5:
00528         case 6:
00529         case 7:
00530         case 8:
00531         case 9:
00532         case 10:
00533         case 11:
00534         case 12:
00535             if (verbose) d_printf("Un-supported Transfer Characteristics: %d using linear color conversion\n", header.imageInfo.channel[0].transfer_characteristics);
00536             dpx->params.doLogarithm= 0;
00537             break;
00538         default:
00539             if (verbose) d_printf("Un-supported Transfer Characteristics: %d\n", header.imageInfo.channel[0].transfer_characteristics);
00540             dpxClose(dpx);
00541             return 0;
00542             break;
00543     }
00544     setupLut(dpx);
00545 
00546     dpx->getRow = &dpxGetRowBytes;
00547     dpx->setRow = 0;
00548     dpx->close = &dpxClose;
00549 
00550     if (verbose) {
00551         verboseMe(dpx);
00552     }
00553 
00554     return dpx;
00555 }
00556 
00557 DpxFile* 
00558 dpxOpen(const char *filename) {
00559     return intern_dpxOpen(LFREALFILE, filename, 0);
00560 }
00561 
00562 DpxFile* 
00563 dpxOpenFromMem(unsigned char *buffer, unsigned int size) {
00564     return intern_dpxOpen(LFMEMFILE, (const char *) buffer, size);
00565 }
00566 
00567 int 
00568 dpxIsMemFileCineon(void *buffer) {
00569     int magicnum = 0;
00570     magicnum = *((int*)buffer);
00571     if (magicnum == ntohl(DPX_FILE_MAGIC)) return 1;
00572     else return 0;
00573 }
00574 
00575 DpxFile*
00576 dpxCreate(const char* filename, int width, int height, int depth) {
00577 
00578     /* Note: always write files in network order */
00579     /* By the spec, it shouldn't matter, but ... */
00580 
00581     DpxMainHeader header;
00582     const char* shortFilename = 0;
00583 
00584     DpxFile* dpx = (DpxFile*)malloc(sizeof(DpxFile));
00585     if (dpx == 0) {
00586         if (verbose) d_printf("Failed to malloc dpx file structure.\n");
00587         return 0;
00588     }
00589 
00590     memset(&header, 0, sizeof(header));
00591 
00592     /* for close routine */
00593     dpx->file = 0;
00594     dpx->lineBuffer = 0;
00595     dpx->pixelBuffer = 0;
00596 
00597     dpx->file = BLI_fopen(filename, "wb");
00598     if (dpx->file == 0) {
00599         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't open file %s\n", filename);
00600         dpxClose(dpx);
00601         return 0;
00602     }
00603     dpx->reading = 0;
00604 
00605     dpx->width = width;
00606     dpx->height = height;
00607     dpx->depth = depth;
00608     dpx->bitsPerPixel = 10;
00609     dpx->imageOffset = sizeof(DpxMainHeader);
00610 
00611     dpx->lineBufferLength = pixelsToLongs(dpx->width * dpx->depth);
00612     dpx->lineBuffer = malloc(dpx->lineBufferLength * 4);
00613     if (dpx->lineBuffer == 0) {
00614         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't malloc line buffer of size %d\n", dpx->lineBufferLength * 4);
00615         dpxClose(dpx);
00616         return 0;
00617     }
00618 
00619     dpx->pixelBuffer = malloc((dpx->lineBufferLength * 3 + 2) * sizeof(unsigned short));
00620     if (dpx->pixelBuffer == 0) {
00621         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't malloc pixel buffer of size %d\n",
00622                 (dpx->width * dpx->depth + 2 + 2) * (int)sizeof(unsigned short));
00623         dpxClose(dpx);
00624         return 0;
00625     }
00626     dpx->pixelBufferUsed = 0;
00627 
00628     /* find trailing part of filename */
00629     shortFilename = strrchr(filename, '/');
00630     if (shortFilename == 0) {
00631         shortFilename = filename;
00632     }
00633     else {
00634         ++shortFilename;
00635     }
00636     initDpxMainHeader(dpx, &header, shortFilename);
00637     logImageGetByteConversionDefaults(&dpx->params);
00638     /* Need set the file type before write the header!
00639      *  2 - Linear
00640      *  3 - Logarithmic
00641      *
00642      * Note that transfer characteristics is U8, don't need
00643      * check the byte order.
00644      */
00645     if (dpx->params.doLogarithm == 0)
00646         header.imageInfo.channel[0].transfer_characteristics= 2;
00647     else
00648         header.imageInfo.channel[0].transfer_characteristics= 3;
00649 
00650     if (fwrite(&header, sizeof(header), 1, dpx->file) == 0) {
00651         if (verbose) d_printf("Couldn't write image header\n");
00652         dpxClose(dpx);
00653         return 0;
00654     }
00655     dpx->fileYPos = 0;
00656     setupLut(dpx);
00657 
00658     dpx->getRow = 0;
00659     dpx->setRow = &dpxSetRowBytes;
00660     dpx->close = &dpxClose;
00661 
00662     return dpx;
00663 }
00664 
00665 void
00666 dpxClose(DpxFile* dpx) {
00667 
00668     if (dpx == 0) {
00669         return;
00670     }
00671 
00672     if (dpx->file) {
00673         fclose(dpx->file);
00674         dpx->file = 0;
00675     }
00676 
00677     if (dpx->lineBuffer) {
00678         free(dpx->lineBuffer);
00679         dpx->lineBuffer = 0;
00680     }
00681 
00682     if (dpx->pixelBuffer) {
00683         free(dpx->pixelBuffer);
00684         dpx->pixelBuffer = 0;
00685     }
00686 
00687     free(dpx);
00688 }
00689 
00690 void
00691 dpxDump(const char* filename) {
00692 
00693     DpxMainHeader header;
00694     FILE* file;
00695 
00696     file = BLI_fopen(filename, "rb");
00697     if (file == 0) {
00698         d_printf("Failed to open file \"%s\".\n", filename);
00699         return;
00700     }
00701 
00702     if (fread(&header, sizeof(header), 1, file) == 0) {
00703         d_printf("Not enough data for header in \"%s\".\n", filename);
00704         fclose(file);
00705         return;
00706     }
00707 
00708     fclose(file);
00709     dumpDpxMainHeader(&header);
00710 }
